    Exercise 0 name dot png

    Exercise 0: name dot png

    Typeset your name on a 600px x 300px artboard in Illustrator and then export it as a png. Choose a typeface that represents who you are but keep it black type on a transparent background (so donâ€™t add a color in the background on the artboard).

    Requirements
    • 600px x 300px
    • transparent .png file
    • your name in black type
    • file named [yourfirstname].png
    • image added to figma
    • image uploaded to blackboard

    Resources

    • How to Save and Adobe Illustrator File as a PNG

    Due Thursday, May 30 by 4:30 pm ET
